sqlMap.select: SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.TARGET_ID , A.TARGET_CD , A.ORD , A.SIGN_USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , B.USR_ID , B.USR_IMG_ID , B.USR_NM , B.EMAIL , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', B.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM , NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', B.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM FROM CMM6600 A JOIN STM3000 B ON A.SIGN_USR_ID = B.USR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TARGET_ID = #targetId# ORDER BY ORD ASC
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, T.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.TARGET_ID , A.TARGET_CD , A.ORD , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' OR A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='02' THEN E.SIGN_USR_ID ELSE A.SIGN_USR_ID END AS LAST_SIGN_USR_ID , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' OR A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='02' THEN SF_STM3000_USR_INFO( E.SIGN_USR_ID , '1') ELSE SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SIGN_USR_ID, '1') END AS LAST_SIGN_USR_NM , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' OR A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='02' THEN SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(E.SIGN_USR_ID , '6') ELSE SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SIGN_USR_ID, '6') END AS LAST_SIGN_USR_IMG_ID , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' THEN '02' ELSE A.SIGN_TYPE_CD END AS NOW_SIGN_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' THEN SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', '02', '1') ELSE SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', A.SIGN_TYPE_CD, '1') END AS NOW_SIGN_TYPE_NM , A.SIGN_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', A.SIGN_TYPE_CD, '1') AS SIGN_TYPE_NM , A.SIGN_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS SIGN_DTM , A.SIGN_RES , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP
, SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', D.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , D.DPL_VER , D.DPL_NM , D.DPL_ID , TO_CHAR(D.DPL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DPL_DT , D.DPL_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(D.DPL_USR_ID, '1') AS DPL_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(D.DPL_USR_ID, '6') AS DPL_USR_IMG_ID , D.DPL_DESC , D.DPL_STS_CD , D.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00003', D.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , D.DPL_REVISION_NUM , D.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00004', D.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , D.DPL_AUTO_DTM , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(D.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(D.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM , D.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00005', D.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM
FROM CMM6601 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , ORD , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD , MAX(SIGN_DTM) AS SIGN_DTM FROM CMM6601 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD = 0 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND SIGN_USR_ID = #usrId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd# GROUP BY LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , ORD , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD ) B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD = A.TARGET_CD) INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(SIGN_DTM) AS SIGN_DTM , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD FROM CMM6601 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd# GROUP BY LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD ) C ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD = C.TARGET_CD AND A.SIGN_DTM = C.SIGN_DTM) LEFT JOIN CMM6600 E ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = E.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID =E.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD =E.TARGET_CD AND (A.ORD+1) = E.ORD)
INNER JOIN DPL1000 D ON (A.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = D.DPL_ID)
WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.DPL_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.NOW_SIGN_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.LAST_SIGN_USR_NM = #searchTargetData#
AND TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(T.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(T.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , T.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.TARGET_ID , A.TARGET_CD , A.ORD , A.SIGN_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO( B.SIGN_USR_ID , '1') AS SIGN_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO( B.SIGN_USR_ID , '6') AS SIGN_USR_IMG_ID , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' OR A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='02' THEN '02' ELSE A.SIGN_TYPE_CD END AS NOW_SIGN_TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN A.SIGN_TYPE_CD='01' THEN SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', '02', '1') ELSE SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', A.SIGN_TYPE_CD, '1') END AS NOW_SIGN_TYPE_NM , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', A.SIGN_TYPE_CD, '1') AS SIGN_TYPE_NM , (SELECT SIGN_USR_ID FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_CD ='02' AND ORD = 0 AND TARGET_ID = A.TARGET_ID) AS SIGN_DRF_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO((SELECT SIGN_USR_ID FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_CD =#targetCd# AND ORD = 0 AND TARGET_ID = A.TARGET_ID) , '1') AS SIGN_DRF_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO((SELECT SIGN_USR_ID FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_CD =#targetCd# AND ORD = 0 AND TARGET_ID = A.TARGET_ID) , '6') AS SIGN_DRF_USR_IMG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS SIGN_DTM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP
, SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', D.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , D.DPL_VER , D.DPL_NM , D.DPL_ID , TO_CHAR(D.DPL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DPL_DT , D.DPL_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(D.DPL_USR_ID, '1') AS DPL_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(D.DPL_USR_ID, '6') AS DPL_USR_IMG_ID , D.DPL_DESC , D.DPL_STS_CD , D.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00003', D.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , D.DPL_REVISION_NUM , D.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00004', D.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , D.DPL_AUTO_DTM , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(D.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(D.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM , D.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00005', D.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM
FROM CMM6601 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(SIGN_DTM) AS SIGN_DTM , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD FROM CMM6601 WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD ) C ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD = C.TARGET_CD AND A.SIGN_DTM = C.SIGN_DTM) LEFT JOIN CMM6600 B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID =B.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD =B.TARGET_CD AND (A.ORD+1) = B.ORD) INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd# AND SIGN_USR_ID = #usrId# AND ORD != 0 ) E ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = E.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_CD = E.TARGET_CD AND A.TARGET_ID = E.TARGET_ID)
INNER JOIN DPL1000 D ON (A.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = D.DPL_ID)
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TARGET_CD = #targetCd# AND A.SIGN_TYPE_CD != '03' AND A.SIGN_TYPE_CD != '04'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.DPL_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.NOW_SIGN_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.LAST_SIGN_USR_NM = #searchTargetData#
AND TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(T.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(T.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMM6600 ( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_CD , TARGET_ID , ORD , SIGN_USR_ID , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #prjId# , #targetCd# , #targetId# , #ord# , #signUsrId# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_ID = #targetId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MAX(ORD) AS MAXORD FROM CMM6600 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_ID = #targetId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd#

SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_CD , TARGET_ID , ORD , SIGN_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(SIGN_USR_ID, '1') AS SIGN_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(SIGN_USR_ID, '2') AS SIGN_USR_EMAIL , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(SIGN_USR_ID, '6') AS SIGN_USR_IMG_ID , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP FROM CMM6600 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND TARGET_ID = #targetId# AND TARGET_CD = #targetCd# AND ORD = #ord#

SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.SIGN_ID , A.TARGET_CD , A.TARGET_ID , A.ORD , A.SIGN_USR_ID , A.SIGN_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00008', A.SIGN_TYPE_CD, '1') AS SIGN_TYPE_NM , A.SIGN_RES , TO_CHAR(A.SIGN_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS SIGN_DTM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM CMM6601 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(SIGN_DTM) AS MAX_SIGN_DTM , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD , ORD FROM CMM6601 GROUP BY LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , TARGET_CD , TARGET_ID , ORD ) B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.TARGET_CD = B.TARGET_CD AND A.ORD=B.ORD) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TARGET_ID = #targetId# AND A.TARGET_CD = #targetCd# AND A.ORD = #ord#
